name: Corrupt Facility
description:
Created for the A2B2 Game Jam for charity

Swap realms and navigate your way through a corrupted facility to escape.

Controls:
WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

E- Interact

Q - swap realms

R - Reset your position inside of the corrupted realm and reset the enemies to their spawn locations

Left CTRL - Crouch

If a button doesn't work try walking away then back at it.
